channel.description: 这是一个追踪经济学人news的种子

item.title: 2021 年 7 月，弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）发表了一篇文章，在 1000 年的历史中狂奔，声称俄罗斯人和乌克兰人是一个民族。这七张地图展示了他对过去的歪曲👇。
item.description: In July 2021 Vladimir Putin published an essay that raced through 1,000 years of history to argue that Russians and Ukrainians are one people. These seven maps demonstrate his distortion of the past econ.st/3Suge4I 👇

item.title: 人们普遍认为，历史在柏林墙倒塌和辣妹乐队创下第一张专辑之后就停止了，但现在，历史又重新开始了，而且发展得如火如荼。记录历史到底有多快？
item.description: History—widely assumed to have stopped somewhere around the fall of the Berlin Wall and the Spice Girls’ first record—has got going again, with gusto. How soon is too soon to chronicle it? econ.st/49lV9A8

item.title: 在 "情报 "节目中@AntonLaGuardia 与 @SecBlinken 一起再次访问中东。达成持久和平协议的希望有多大？请收听播客： 👇
item.description: On “The Intelligence” @AntonLaGuardia joins @SecBlinken on another tour of the Middle East. What hope is there of a lasting peace deal? Listen to the podcast: econ.st/48cgvPs 👇

item.title: 为什么企业难以使用大学的创意？企业实验室的消失是答案之一。这些机构是思想家和实干家生动活泼的混合体👇。
item.description: Why do companies struggle to use ideas produced by universities? The loss of the corporate lab is one part of the answer. Such institutions were home to a lively mixture of thinkers and doers econ.st/3ugi0hY 👇

item.title:
前总统米哈伊尔-萨卡什维利在返回格鲁吉亚后不久被捕。
他声称这些指控是出于政治动机，这在一定程度上是有道理的。但是，在该国的选举中，事关重大的不仅仅是一个人的自由。
item.description:
Shortly after his return to Georgia, Mikheil Saakashvili, the former president, was arrested.

He claims, with some justification, that the charges are politically motivated. But there is more at stake than one man’s freedom in the country’s elections econ.st/3ufAwaf

item.title: "2020 "加入了一系列关于科维德-19 的书籍行列。书中充满了关于封锁、面具和其他一切争论的细节，令人印象深刻。但对于刚刚经历过这一切的读者来说，这本书并不有趣👇。
item.description: “2020” joins a rash of books about covid-19. It is filled with impressive detail on arguments over lockdowns, masks and all the rest of it. But it is, for readers who have just lived through all of that, not much fun econ.st/3SN7k3z 👇

item.title: 马德里正处于一个重要时刻。自 2016 年以来，马德里的外来人口增长了 20%，其中大部分是拉丁裔，使这座城市日益成为迈阿密的竞争对手，成为 "拉丁美洲之都" 👇。
item.description: Madrid is having a moment. Its foreign population has grown by 20% since 2016, much of that Latino, making the city a growing rival to Miami as the “capital of Latin America” econ.st/49n1cEA 👇

item.title: 乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelensky）希望在 2024 年期间生产 100 万架 "第一人称视角 "无人机。这些武器为何成为乌克兰战争的关键部分？ 👇
item.description: Volodymyr Zelensky, Ukraine’s president, wants to produce 1m First Person View drones over the course of 2024. Why have these weapons become a critical part of the war in Ukraine? econ.st/49rfJz5 👇

item.title:
自 2021 年达到顶峰以来，中国和香港股票市值下降了近 7 万亿美元。尽管美国股市上涨了 14%，印度股市上涨了 60%，但中国和香港股市的市值却下降了约 35%。
股价下跌预示着一个根本性问题 👇👇。
item.description:
The market value of China’s and Hong Kong’s shares is down by nearly $7trn since its peak in 2021. That is a fall of around 35%, even as that of America’s stocks has risen by 14%, and India’s by 60%.

The decline signals a fundamental problem econ.st/484jI3P 👇

item.title:
♦️ 最高法院将审议科罗拉多州将唐纳德-特朗普排除在选票之外的决定。
♦️ 参议院将就两党边境法案中的对外援助部分进行表决。

item.description:
♦️ The Supreme Court will consider Colorado’s decision to keep Donald Trump off the ballot.

♦️ The Senate will vote on the foreign aid part of a bipartisan border-bill.

♦️ Nevada’s Republican caucus begins.

Follow the latest in American politics: econ.st/48ews7Q

item.title:
现代精确制导武器最早出现在 50 多年前。但是，精确的代价是高昂的。
如果能将精确性和丰富性结合起来呢？乌克兰战场上首次回答了这个问题 👇
item.description:
Modern precision-guided weapons first appeared over 50 years ago. But precision came with a high price tag.

What if you could combine precision and abundance? That question is being answered for the first time on the battlefields of Ukraine econ.st/42uBR9L 👇

item.title:
在纳伊布-布凯莱以违反宪法的方式大获全胜之后，接下来会发生什么？
萨尔瓦多的 "哲学家国王 "已经在暗示第三个任期。批评者担心他对权力的渴望和对制衡的蔑视 👇
item.description:
After Nayib Bukele’s crushing, unconstitutional victory, what comes next?

El Salvador’s “philosopher king” is already hinting at a third term. Critics worry about his appetite for power and scorn for checks and balances econ.st/3SWiqnf 👇

item.title:
宪法第 14 修正案中禁止叛乱分子担任公职的条款能否阻止唐纳德-特朗普再次成为总统？
最高法院正在审理他对科罗拉多州取消其共和党初选投票资格的决定提出的上诉👇。
item.description:
Could a 14th Amendment provision banning insurrectionists from office bar Donald Trump from becoming president again?

The Supreme Court is considering his appeal against Colorado’s decision to disqualify him from the Republican primary ballot econ.st/3OAMz8U 👇

item.title:
在防暴警察将反对党议员拖出议会后，塞内加尔的选举被推迟。
阅读该国民主如何受到攻击： 👇
item.description:
Senegal’s election has been delayed after riot police dragged opposition MPs out of parliament.

Read how democracy is under attack in the country: econ.st/49pxAXm 👇

item.title:
在今年的美国大选中，赌注异常之大：选举结果可能会影响 2024 年的国家和世界事务，这是前所未有的。
通过我们全新的每日时事通讯《美国简讯》（The US in brief），您可以随时了解最重要的政治新闻，⬇️。
item.description:
In America’s elections this year the stakes are unusually high: the outcome could shape national and world affairs like no other in 2024.

Stay up to date on the most important political news with The US in brief, our new daily newsletter econ.st/3UtXLrx ⬇️

item.title:
"Ganjar Pranowo 认为："作为一个海洋国家，印尼应将自己视为'Garda Samudera'，即海洋守护者。
这位总统候选人认为，印尼必须与本地区其他国家合作，以确保印度洋-太平洋地区的和平。
item.description:
“Indonesia, as a maritime nation, should see itself as ‘Garda Samudera’, the Guardian of the Seas,” argues Ganjar Pranowo.

The presidential candidate believes the country must work with others in the region to ensure a peaceful Indo-Pacific econ.st/3OwB8PB

item.title: @sarah_birke 告诉 "情报"，生育率的下降正在推动拉丁美洲人口向老年社会的转变--而这也带来了问题。
item.description: Plunging fertility rates are supercharging Latin America’s demographic shift to an elderly society, @sarah_birke tells “The Intelligence”—and that comes with problems econ.st/3wgm1Do

item.title: 参议院的边境法案对国会政治有何启示？美国国会的一院正在努力治理国家。另一院只想竞选 👇
item.description: What does the Senate’s border bill reveal about congressional politics? One chamber of America’s Congress is trying to govern. The other just wants to campaign econ.st/3uiaZx8 👇

item.title:
法院驳回了唐纳德-特朗普的绝对豁免权主张。这可能会为他的选举干扰案开庭审理铺平道路。
更有可能的是，在这个充斥着充满争议的选举年之争的季节，特朗普将加速前往最高法院👇。
item.description:
A court has rejected Donald Trump’s claim to absolute immunity. That could pave the way for his election-interference trial to begin.

More likely, in a season rife with fraught election-year battles, is an accelerated trip to the Supreme Court econ.st/49JkEfh 👇

item.title: 美国正试图将以色列定居者赶回去。但他们在政治和当地的势力并没有减弱的迹象👇。
item.description: America is trying to peg Israel’s settlers back. But their power in politics and on the ground shows no sign of waning econ.st/3UxNric 👇

item.title:
"菲利普-福克斯（Philip Fox）写道："人工智能发展得太快了，我们不能采取'观望'的态度。政治家们 "现在必须决定他们愿意接受多大的公共话语风险"。
图片丹-威廉姆斯
item.description:
“AI is moving too fast for a ‘wait and see’ approach,” writes Philip Fox. Politicians “must decide now how much risk to public discourse they are willing to accept” econ.st/3SBZoBc

Image: Dan Williams

item.title:
几乎所有地方的女性在为人父母后，其职业生涯都会受到影响，而且影响比男性更大。
我们探讨了爱与劳动对母亲就业的成本👇。
item.description:
Almost everywhere women’s careers suffer—more than men’s—after they become parents.

We explore the cost of love and labour on mothers’ employment econ.st/48ZkzUH 👇

item.title: 印度腐败警察的目标是纳伦德拉-莫迪的批评者吗？过去十年中，洗钱突袭增加了 27 倍，其中许多是针对反对派的 👇
item.description: Are India’s corruption police targeting Narendra Modi’s critics? Money-laundering raids, many on the opposition, have increased 27-fold in the last decade econ.st/3UseH1B 👇

item.title: 非洲最便宜的新建房屋一般也要 2 万至 4 万美元。而人均收入仅为 1700 美元左右。在贷款难的非洲大陆，住房短缺正促使人们进行彻底的反思 👇
item.description: The cheapest newly built house in Africa generally costs the equivalent of $20,000-40,000. Yet income per person is only about $1,700. In a continent where loans are hard to come by, the housing shortage is prompting a radical rethink econ.st/499npXk 👇

item.title: 成绩好的人在太阳升起之前就已经做了充分的锻炼。他们不会因为觉得有点累而取消早餐，当然他们也不会承认这样做。我们解释了为什么精力似乎在成功中扮演着重要角色👇。
item.description: High-achievers have done a full workout before the sun rises. They don’t cancel breakfasts because they are feeling a bit tired; they certainly don’t admit to doing so. We explain why energy seems to play an outsize role in success econ.st/3w5AnGO 👇

item.title: 世界上最可爱的语言是什么？我们回顾语言的魅力 👇
item.description: What is the world’s loveliest language? We review the attractiveness of speech econ.st/3umtT5X 👇

item.title:
自 2012 年以来，英格兰和威尔士的毒品致死率逐年上升。20 世纪 70 年代出生的人最有可能死亡。
最令人担忧的是合成阿片类药物的消费👇。
item.description:
Drug fatalities in England and Wales have risen every year since 2012. People born in the 1970s are the likeliest to die.

The most worrying part of the picture involves the consumption of synthetic opioids econ.st/3UD2E1P 👇

item.title: 考虑到其糟糕的经济管理，埃及无能的政权不应该得到救助。但它还是应该得到救助。中东地区已经火烧眉毛，经不起人口最多国家的崩溃👇。
item.description: Egypt’s feckless regime does not deserve a bailout, considering its atrocious economic management. But it should get one nonetheless. The wider Middle East, already burning, cannot afford the collapse of its most populous country econ.st/3wfv4EB 👇

item.title: 在经历了数周的股市动荡之后，中国证券监督管理委员会主任突然被解职撤换。他不是第一个在股价暴跌后落马的官员，但这次感觉不同👇。
item.description: After weeks of stockmarket instability the head of the China Securities Regulatory Commission was suddenly fired and replaced. He is not the first official to fall after a period of plummeting stock prices, but this time feels different econ.st/3HRg9Dj 👇

item.title:
与许多民粹主义政党一样，波兰的法律与公正党在其执政的八年中，攫取了对独立国家机构的控制权，并在这些机构中充斥着忠实拥护者。
现在，唐纳德-图斯克正努力消除强硬右翼对国家的控制👇。
item.description:
Like many populist parties, Poland’s Law and Justice party grabbed control of independent state institutions and packed them with loyalists during its eight years in power.

Now Donald Tusk is trying to undo the hard-right’s capture of the state econ.st/49rThpO 👇
